attributes.action: Make healthy and nutritional food much cheaper and accessible for all especially children, the sick and the elderly.
attributes.additional_details: For the government to take steps to ensure expensive healthy nutritional food items and natural food products are made more accessible to all and ensure the prices of such are made affordable. Currently the nation is expected to thrive off a poor diet of much more affordable 'junk food' disguised and promoted as 'healthy'. Help people to help themselves. The nation needs nourishing. "Let food be thy medicine and let medicine be thy food" Hippocrates.
